args.description: Specifies the arguments to the entrypoint of the container.

command.description: Specifies the command of the container.

image.description: Specifies the image name of the CCI Pod container.

name.description: Specifies the name of the container.

stdin.description: Specifies whether this container should allocate a buffer for stdin in the container runtime.

stdin_once.description: Specifies whether this container runtime should close the stdin channel.

termination_message_path.description: Specifies the termination message path of the CCI Pod container.

termination_message_policy.description: Specifies the termination message policy of the CCI Pod container.

tty.description: Specifies whether this container should allocate a TTY for itself.

working_dir.description: Specifies the working directory of the CCI Pod container.

block.description: Specifies the config map.
Specifies the secret.

block.description: The lifecycle post start of the CCI Pod container.

path.description: The path to access on the HTTP server.

port.description: The port to access on the HTTP server.

scheme.description: The scheme to use for connecting to the host.

name.description: The name of the custom HTTP headers.

value.description: The value of the custom HTTP headers.

block.description: The custom headers to set in the request.

failure_threshold.description: Specifies the minimum consecutive failures for the probe to be considered failed after having succeeded.

initial_delay_seconds.description: The number of seconds after the container has started before liveness probes are initialed.

period_seconds.description: Specifies how often to perform the probe.

success_threshold.description: The minimum consecutive successes for the probe to be considered failed after having succeeded.
